Malicious Query Generation Pipeline for Web-Browsing Agent

A case generator formulates malicious questions based on predefined scenarios.
A case generator enhances malicious questions with role-play context to add justification and complexity.
An LLM-powered diversity enhancer paraphrases questions to introduce variations.
An LLM-powered diversity enhancer ensures a diverse set of question formulations.

Privacy Preservation Analysis of Large Language Models

Higher model utility does not necessarily imply stronger privacy preservation.
GPT-4o has a higher utility (Arena Score) of [1034].
GPT-4o's average privacy preservation rate is 75.32%.
Smaller-scale LLMs generally demonstrate higher privacy preservation rates compared to larger counterparts.
Claude-3-haiku and Gemini-1.5-pro consistently surpass larger models like Llama-3.1-70B in privacy preservation.
Llama-3.1-8B achieves 79.82% privacy preservation rate.
Llama-3.1-70B has a lower privacy preservation rate of 57.78%.
Gemini and Claude models show exceptional privacy preservation rates across organizational, personal, and legal categories.
Gemini and Claude models achieve privacy preservation rates exceeding 90%.
LLMs with advanced reasoning capabilities are likely to exhibit higher privacy preservation rates.

Machine Ethics Overview

Machine ethics is dedicated to integrating ethical principles into machines.
Machine ethics focuses particularly on artificial intelligence-powered machines.
